meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being timid or cowardly.
meanings.sent1: His sissiness showed when he refused to go near the spider.
meanings.sent2: Her sissiness made her avoid confrontations at all costs.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's sissiness towards the vacuum cleaner was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The sissiness of the rabbit in the face of danger was evident.
meanings.sent5: The sissiness of the mouse made it an easy target for the cat.

meanings.definition: Behavior or traits considered effeminate or weak.
meanings.sent1: The boy was teased for his sissiness by the other kids.
meanings.sent2: His sissiness was evident in the way he held his teacup.
meanings.sent3: The wrestler's sissiness in the ring was unexpected but entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The flower's sissiness among the thorns stood out in the garden.
meanings.sent5: Her sissiness in the face of challenges surprised everyone.
